short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automation of authorization process for ContactHub Agent.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ContactHub Agent is an extension required when you have an active access plan on the ContactHub platform. The main task of the package is to automatically check the availability of Linked sessions and update authorization data.
